[{ns4 monkbar}]
[{superdoc title chooser}] [{monktitlebar}]
CONTAINED_STUFF [% my $str; $str .= htmlcode('minilogin') . "
\n" if getId($USER) == $HTMLVARS{guest_user}; $str .= evalCode( getCode("nodelet meta-container") ) . "\n"; "$str\n"; %]
